Aaaawell most fruit is loaded with fructose fructose is a sugar (carbohydrate).We do know that ALL carbohydrates raise Blood Glucose (BG)let me repeat thatALL carbs raise BGrice, pasta, potato, wheat (bread),  sugar, honey,  most fruit  ALL contain significant amounts of carbs and will raise BG.Get a BG (Blood Glucose) meter.  Test before you eat, test 1 hour after you eat.  if your BG is too high you eat too many carbs.Too high is over 140 (US measure) 7.8 every ware else.Google "eat to your meter" for more infoand exercise is excellent to help control BG.
